titles.title: A bill to prohibit assistance to foreign governments that violate human rights with respect to religious freedom.
A bill to prohibit assistance to foreign governments that violate human rights with respect to religious freedom.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill requires the President to submit a report listing each foreign government that imposes a death sentence or life imprisonment pursuant to laws against apostasy, blasphemy, or interfaith marriages, and it prohibits the United States from using any funds to provide assistance to the government of a country identified in the report.
